title: Spyder FAQs: How To Wire HALOs, CCFLs and LED Accessories
description: This video is designed to show you how to wire your Spyder Auto projector headlights, whether you have LED or CCFL halos. This video will also show you how to wire LED accessories like DRL LEDs. During the course of this film we will show you how to determine what wires to tap for power for your Halo rings and LED accessories. Regardless of your make or model, this tutorial should help you determine how to wire your own setup.
tags: Spyder Auto, projector headlights, LED, CCFL, how to install, FAQ, LED accessories, wiring, Halo rings, how to wire spyder lights
